title: Bilgdewater
body: I've played 4 or 5 games since getting to the 750 krakens spending and its still sitting at 0/750 and 0 upgrades and this is from today and yesterday

replies.body: It should update eventually, there is probably a lot of load going on for the server. Expect it to be fine when the event ends.
now its updated and it only counts the last game i played not the 4 or 5 before it
